synopsis.text: Tooyama Kagemoto, a distinguished figure of the Edo period, serves as the inspiration for this captivating science-fiction anime. Kagemoto, a hatamoto and esteemed official under the Tokugawa shogunate, was famously known by his childhood name, Kinshirou, fondly abbreviated to Kin-san. This revered character has been immortalized in various forms of media, including novels penned by acclaimed authors like Jinde Tatsurou and Yuuki Kyousuke, as well as multiple live-action television series. The character's first notable appearance was in the 1893 kabuki play, 'Toyama no Kinsan,' further solidifying Kin-san's enduring legacy in Japanese culture. Delve into the thrilling world of this anime, which masterfully blends historical roots with futuristic elements, providing a unique and engaging viewing experience.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
